name: 996 At The Start
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeUnknown
content: A sad reminder that the social animal Li Xiaoming finally hugged the thighs of a rich and beautiful woman and was about to start a lascivious life, but was arrested by the [007] system and sent to another world to continue with the [996] system! [007] System: Take this [996] system, and you will no longer be a mortal from now onâ€¦ Li Xiaoming: Who wants this bullshit cheat?! I want to go home! [007] System: Only by doing good deeds and accumulating merit points, can you go back. The System [996]
